etymons.notes: kšy to pile up, heap CSD 228

Preterit.text: bi=šato du=Sayfo laḥ-ḥanfe kšalle kəšyawoṯo d-qṭile Mšiḥoye b-ṭurʕabdin. In the year of S., the godless heaped up heaps of murdered Christians in Turabdin.

Infectum + Infectum-wa.text: bu=payəz an-noše kokošən aq-qayse ʕal ḥḏoḏe (Ilyas July 2020)
W i=naqqa d-xayifo d-lo mənqoliwa, saymiwayna hawxa d-əmmat tamo bi=arʕo, čike-ste hawxa d-nəšfi, d-miḥoṣi bə-ḥḏoḏe. ṣira, tarte, tlōṯ w bu=šəklawo, košənwanne bə-ḥḏoḏe (2019_13_01 Malf_Ishaq No 83)
